utter_faq/installation_python.text: Make sure to select the box "add python to PATH"
Go to windows search bar and Type "Python". If Python-version-bits shows up, you have successfully installed Python in your machine.

utter_faq/installation_anaconda.text: Download the anaconda software from following- https://www.anaconda.com/products/distribution
click next, accept the License Agreement
Select the user for whom you want to isntall the anaconda (just me or All users)
Add anaconda to the PATH variable and click Install.
After installation - if required, you may also install PyCharm from the link provided.
Go to windows search bar and Type "Jupyter notebook". If Jupyter Notebook (anaconda3) shows up, you have successfully installed Anaconda with Jupyter notebook
